> **crochet dishcloth series
** > ======================================= > this design is part of a larger collection of dishcloth patterns all of which feature a unique stitch pattern
> find out more here → ** ned & mimi crochet dishcloth series 1 ** **lavender fields washcloth** this simple crochet dishcloth pattern uses basic stitches to create a striking texture perfect for adding a colorful touch to your kitchen or bathroom the pattern is written for 2 sizes - washcloth and tea towel - but also includes instructions for adjusting the stitch pattern to make a custom size **materials** **yarn ** any weight 4/worsted weight yarn in a cotton or cotton blend * washcloth 102yds / 93m * approx equal amounts of each color plus a little extra for the border color * * tea towel 390yds / 357m * approx equal amounts of each color plus a little extra for the border color * *recommended yarns * * drops paris 2 * wecrochet dishie 3 * paintbox yarns cotton aran 4 * lion brand 24/7 cotton 5 * rico creative cotton aran 6 **hook ** 5mm h-8 crochet hook 7 --- **join my newsletter ** ======================================== subscribe to my newsletter 8 to be kept in the
